alert.note: Alert for East Honolulu; Kauai East; Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Olomana (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued July 19 at 4:54AM HST until July 19 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR EAST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND MAUI MOLOKAI AND KAHOOLAWE THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR EAST FACING SHORES OF OAHU AND KAUAI THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... .Swell from Tropical Storm Calvin will continue to build for east facing shores of Kauai and Oahu today but will be on the decline for exposed east facing shores of Maui County and the Big Island. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Large and disorganized waves building to 8 to 12 feet by this afternoon. * WHERE...East facing shores of Kauai and Oahu. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST today. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: East Honolulu; Kauai East; Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Olomana
